data.name: RADical ROACH Remastered
data.detailed_description:
RADical ROACH is a fast paced shoot em’ up, set minutes after nuclear hell falls from the sky engulfing all but a few tough little bugs. Play as the super little radiated roach with new found powers, get to safety before the army of fleas gets you.

Features

  • Fast paced shmup action.
  • A cartoony world full of cute but deadly little bugs.
  • Spit through a huge variety of enemies
  • Savage boss creatures.
  • Venture through unique environments.
  • Controller support.
  • 35 steam achievements..
